1338036208937672704.full_text:
【#Nanjing #nanjingmassacre 】今天10：01，防空警报拉响，在侵华日军南京大屠杀遇难同胞纪念馆，在新街口，在鼓楼广场，在中山码头，在正觉寺丛葬地......看南京全城鸣笛默哀画面，缅怀在南京大屠杀中遇难的同胞。今天，国家公祭日 ，愿逝者安息，和平永存；勿忘历史，吾辈自强
-- #Nanking Remember https://t.co/gB4dNLwLRS

1338037913821442049.full_text: @UN #nanjingmassacre  Call for peace, don't let innocent people suffer the misfortune of war.

1338023348400480257.full_text: The number of #NanjingMassacre survivors officially registered at the memorial hall has now fallen to 73. The invading Japanese troops captured Nanjing on Dec 13, 1937, killing 300,000 Chinese civilians and unarmed soldiers over a six-week period. #NationalMemorialDay https://t.co/ihjqAJIbh9
